page.title: 04Housing Gardens Attitudes
page.content: My house is Edwardian.The roof has got tiles on it. The bricks on our house are reddish-brown and they go in a pattern. Our garden is large and it has got a wood .In our wood we have got lots and lots of daffodils. We have got three apple trees and a plum tree.(Tessa) My house is new and large. My garden is large. I have brick on my roof in a curved pattern. At the end of the garden someone planted a tree for V.E. Day. My bit of garden used to be a little pool. I have some flowers and fruit. I have a big tree and a gardener. My garden is best in May when it is prettiest.(Emily)
